title: Buying OJs - C.Bennett, Moffet, Clark (Hughes), Swartwood, Spud Johnson & Sharsig
author: shammus

posts.post_title: Buying OJs - C.Bennett, Moffet, Clark (Hughes), Swartwood, Spud Johnson & Sharsig
posts.post_content:
Just looking for a few specific players, any pose is fine....willing to buy or trade!  

Here's a complete list of cards I wouldn't mind picking up -

Andrews/Hoover, Van Dyke, Bill White, Ebright, Candy Nelson, Buster Hoover, Chief Roseman, Gardner / Murray, Germany Long (KC), Cupid Childs, Henderson / Greer, Jim Banning, Jim Cudworth, Jim McDonald, Jim Tyng, Kelly / Powell, Patrick Pettee, Reddy Mack, Samuel Nichols, Welch / Gleason, Uncle Bill Alvord, Wild Bill Hutchinson, Nichol / Reilly, Boyce, Ferson, Bogart, Candy Nelson, Daniel Shannon, F. Hutchinson, F. Zinn, Winkleman, Germany Long (KC), Jack Nelson, John Sterling, Pete Browning, Rudy Kemler, Bennett, Moffet, Clark & Hughes, Swartwood, Spud Johnson and Sharsig

Thanks in advance,

Brian
[url]redmaccie@hotmail.com[/url]
I search often for Swartwood.  Are you looking for a particular pose or team?
Any card whatsoever for any of the players I listed above would be great by me!  Thanks for asking....I should have mentioned that before.
